name: Desert engineer
description:
This game is about soviet engineer Petrovich, who had to works in the ancient Egypt. You need to help people by repairing steam engines.

Control is described inside, just read "info.txt"

Made by:

  • AlexeyJava (code)
  • Borisigor (graphic)
  • Vlad (code, dialogs)

Launch game on Linux: /usr/games/desertengineer/game
